wiki.content: Engineered, Mixed and Produced by Tim Vesely Performed by Jane Gowan and Tim Vesely Recorded at The Woodshed Studio, Toronto Mastered by Tim Vesely Cover design and illustration by Jane Gowan Special thanks to George Semkiw One Last Show of Hearts is the follow up to Shade’s debut album Highway. It was recorded on a series of Sundays in the winter months of 2011. Jane worked with friend and part-time band member Tim Vesely (who also produced the first record) to create a simple-yet-lush group of songs that address human nature and circumstance: the victories, the defeats, the way home. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
